issue.title: [C++][Compute] Remove `seq` as a parameter of ExecNode::InputReceived
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13660](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13660). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
`seq` is a parameter on which no useful guarantees can be provided and which causes confusion since it could be construed to imply ordering, uniqueness of the tag, etc. Let's simplify the API by simply removing it

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13660?focusedCommentId=17401284) by Ben Kietzman (bkietz):*
Issue resolved by pull request 10961
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/10961>
